message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs.  Given its value, I'm offering it to you at a price of $20,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. However, $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price. While $20,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down a bit. How about we settle at $17,000? This feels like a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $17,000 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $13,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
